name: Rainbow Veggie Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa until fluffy. Arrange fresh spinach, diced bell peppers, shredded carrots, sliced avocado, and chickpeas over quinoa. Drizzle with tahini dressing and serve.

name: Grilled Salmon with Quinoa
instructions: Season salmon with herbs and grill until flaky. Cook quinoa with vegetable broth. Steam asparagus until tender. Serve salmon over quinoa with asparagus and lemon wedge.

name: Tropical Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend frozen banana and mango with coconut milk until smooth. Pour into bowl and top with fresh blueberries, chia seeds, coconut flakes, and granola.

name: Mediterranean Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast ezekiel bread until golden. Mash avocado with lemon juice and spread on toast. Top with cherry tomatoes, crumbled feta, fresh herbs, and drizzle with olive oil.

name: Keto Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Heat coconut oil in wok. Stir-fry chicken until cooked through. Add vegetables and garlic, cook until tender-crisp. Season with herbs and serve hot.

name: Power Green Smoothie
instructions: Blend fresh spinach, banana, apple, fresh ginger, lemon juice and coconut water until smooth. Add ice if desired. Serve immediately for best nutrition.

name: Protein-Packed Lentil Salad
instructions: Cook lentils until tender, drain and cool. Dice cucumber, tomatoes, and red onion. Mix with lentils and fresh parsley. Dress with olive oil and lemon vinaigrette.

name: Healthy Meal Prep Bowls
instructions: Prep components separately: cook brown rice, grill chicken breast, roast sweet potato cubes, steam broccoli. Assemble in containers with hummus for a complete meal.

name: Cauliflower Rice Stir Fry
instructions: Rice cauliflower in food processor. Scramble eggs and set aside. Stir-fry vegetables, add cauliflower rice, then eggs. Season with soy sauce and serve hot.

name: Chia Pudding Parfait
instructions: Mix chia seeds with almond milk and vanilla. Refrigerate overnight until thick. Layer in glass with fresh berries and nuts. Drizzle with honey before serving.
